scripts.vercel-install: git submodule update --init --remote projects/syonet_eight_variables && (cd projects/syonet_eight_variables && git checkout master && git pull) && git submodule update --init --remote projects/syonet_eight_design_system && (cd projects/syonet_eight_design_system && git checkout master && git pull) && git submodule update --init --remote projects/syonet_eight_www && (cd projects/syonet_eight_www && git checkout master && git pull)&& yarn install
scripts.dev:www: cd projects/syonet_eight_www && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect=9230' next dev
scripts.dev:ogp: cd projects/syonet_eight_ogp && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9233 ../../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless.js offline --httpPort 4000 --websocketPort 4001 --lambdaPort 4002 --stage development
scripts.deploy:ogp: yarn build_swagger_json:ogp && cd projects/syonet_eight_ogp && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SLS_DEBUG=* sls deploy --stage production
scripts.destroy:ogp: cd projects/syonet_eight_ogp && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SLS_DEBUG=* sls remove --stage production
scripts.dev:algolia: cd projects/syonet_eight_algolia && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9235 ../../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless.js offline --httpPort 4003 --websocketPort 4004 --lambdaPort 4005 --stage development
scripts.run:development:algolia: cd projects/syonet_eight_algolia && cross-env NODE_ENV=development serverless invoke local --function
scripts.run:production:algolia: aws lambda invoke --invocation-type Event --region us-east-1 --function-name syonet-algolia-production-www_page algolia_response.json
scripts.deploy:algolia: cd projects/syonet_eight_algolia && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SLS_DEBUG=* sls deploy --stage production
scripts.destroy:algolia: cd projects/syonet_eight_algolia && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SLS_DEBUG=* sls remove --stage production
scripts.build:design_system: cd projects/syonet_eight_design_system && rimraf dist && tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack
scripts.dev: rimraf projects/syonet_eight_www/.next && npm-run-all --parallel build:variables && npm-run-all --parallel dev:*
scripts.rm:all: rimraf projects/syonet_eight_design_system/dist projects/syonet_eight_variables/dist projects/syonet_eight_www/.next node_modules projects/syonet_eight_www/node_modules projects/syonet_eight_design_system/node_modules
scripts.deploy:storybook: cd projects/syonet_eight_storybook && cross-env SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy
scripts.destroy:storybook: cd projects/syonet_eight_storybook && cross-env SLS_DEBUG=* serverless remove --force
scripts.storycap:www: cd projects/syonet_eight_www && storycap --serverCmd "npx http-server storybook-static -p 9001" http://localhost:9001
scripts.storycap:design_system: cd projects/syonet_eight_design_system && storycap --serverCmd "npx http-server storybook-static -p 9001" http://localhost:9001
